attributes.description: True if the order relationship is ‘before’, if False, it is ‘after’.
attributes.name: is_before

attributes.description: Node identifier of sibling before or after which this node should come.
attributes.name: sibling_node_id

functions.meaning: True if the order relationship is `_after_`, computed as the negation of `_is_before_`.
functions.name: is_after

meta_info.description: Defines the order indicator that can be used on a `C_OBJECT` within a container attribute in a specialised archetype to indicate its order with respect to a sibling defined in a higher specialisation level.
meta_info.name: SIBLING_ORDER
